video_prompt: Ethereal anime character, long flowing hair, subtly shifting gaze, reflective glasses showing cityscape lights. Soft focus background with glowing particle movements. Delicate facial expressions evolve.
image_prompt: Close-up anime character portrait, female, chest-up, grayscale with subtle blue accents. Focus on face, long light hair, round silver-rimmed glasses with cityscape reflections. Large expressive blue eyes, subtle tear-shaped earring, glossy lips. Ethereal glowing particles, soft lighting, blurred light background.
refined_video_prompt: Long hair undulates and flows with subtle currents. The character's gaze continuously shifts, subtly altering the cityscape light reflections shimmering across their glasses. Delicate facial expressions evolve through fleeting emotions. In the soft-focus background, glowing particles drift, swirl, and pulse dynamically.
